description: two female figures sleeping in bed; figure in the foreground on her side with arm in front of her and the figure in the background is on a large pillow with her arm draped across her forehead; behind the bed in the upper left is a window with a quarter moon
inscription: LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Walter Gramatté (E. No. 145) | LRC of sheet, in pencil: 35 [encircled]
markings: BC stamped in plate: 15609 | UR margin in plate stamped upside down and in reverse: fait en 1911 | LRC in plate in reverse: R
title: Sleeping Girl (Sonia Gramatté)
